message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90 just yet. I'm willing to compromise, though! I can offer you the product for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! I can see we're almost there. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my last offer and your latest one. How about I sell it to you for $102.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $97.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $97.50?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! I can see we're really close. I'm willing to meet you at $98. I think this is a fair price for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $96. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $96?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I think $98 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $96 and $98, so how about $97?
